DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy : judged participant ; Age : 18 35 . Exclusion criterion : Pregnant lactating female Presence chronic disease diabetes , illness , dysmetabolic syndrome 18.5 < BMI < 25 Allergy intolerance palm coconut Weight loss gain 5 kg last two month Fasting blood glucose level < 100 mg/dl 5.6 mmol/l Smokers Use medication birth control Previous problem blood sample
